The first step (after installing the package) is to load the library, along with the library dplyr, tidyr and ggplot2.

```{r,echo=T,message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(p2synthr)
```

Check the dataset `owid`

```{r,echo=T}
owid
```
